a post with code

July 15, 2015 â€” 16:09

This theme implements a built-in Jekyll feature, the use of Pygments, for sytanx highlighting. It supports more than 100 languages. This example is in C++. All you have to do is wrap your code in a liquid tag:

{% highlight c++ %}
code code code
{% endhighlight %}

Produces something like this:


Feel free to email me if you have any questions using mail@lukegeeson.com

This site was built using Jekyll, with the Folio Theme from JekyllThemes.io and is hosted on Github
